title: Under the skin
text:

title: 1  Chapter: ELS and adolescent comorbidity
text:
Effects of pre- and postnatal early-life stress on internalizing, adiposity and their comorbidity
In summary, this book has no content whatsoever (Boyd et al., 2012; Fraser et al., 2013). But I shall write it anyway cause. Cause I kind of do have no choice so, checking justification works
